titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Akaka. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 2/11/2009--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs for the 111th Congress.
